summary.textblock: The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) announces the renewal of two FDA advisory committees by the Commissioner of Food and Drugs. This notice is issued under the Federal Advisory Committee Act of October 6, 1972 (Pub. L. 92-463 (5 U.S.C. app. 2)).

date.textblock: Authority for these committees will expire on the date indicated below unless the Commissioner formally determines that the renewal is in the public interest.

table.textblock: Vaccines and Related Biological Products Advisory Committee

further.textblock: Donna M. Combs, Committee Management Office (HFA-306), Food and Drug Administration, 5600 Fishers Lane, Rockville, MD 20857, 301-443-2765.
